This item is perfect for mages who deal damage with area-of-effect abilities and want to slow down enemies.
It provides bonuses to health, ability power, and magic penetration, enhancing your abilities and increasing survivability.
The "Icy" effect slows enemies by 30% for 1 second when dealing damage with active abilities or empowered attacks.
This makes the item an excellent choice for champions with area-of-effect damage who can control the battlefield and slow enemies, such as Lissandra or Amumu.
